languages.text: "Вы не ошибаетесь. Мой путь был долгим и кровавым, но в итоге мне удалось подняться от главаря банды, державшей станцию очистных фильтров, до Наместника Футфола. Многие умерли, чтобы это случилось. А те, кто выжил, решили, что куда удобнее поставить во главе меня, чем продолжать резню и дележ добычи. Смею надеяться, что мое возвышение и принесенный им мир пошли станции на пользу".

traits.locale_text: "Вы не ошибаетесь. Мой путь был долгим и кровавым, но в итоге мне удалось подняться от главаря банды, державшей станцию очистных фильтров, до наместника Футфола. Многие умерли, чтобы это случилось. А те, кто выжил, решили, что куда удобнее поставить во главе меня, чем продолжать резню и дележ добычи. Смею надеяться, что мое возвышение и принесенный им мир пошли станции на пользу".

languages.text: "You aren't wrong. My path was long and bloody, but in the end I rose from running a gang that had staked its claim to a treatment filter station to becoming the Liege of Footfall. Many died to make this possible. And those who survived figured it would be more convenient to put me at the head than continue the slaughter of the turf war. I can only hope that my elevation and the peace that came with it have done the station good."
languages.original_text: "Вы не ошибаетесь. Мой путь был долгим и кровавым, но в итоге мне удалось подняться от главаря банды, державшей станцию очистных фильтров, до Наместника Футфола. Многие умерли, чтобы это случилось. А те, кто выжил, решили, что куда удобнее поставить во главе меня, чем продолжать резню и дележ добычи. Смею надеяться, что мое возвышение и принесенный им мир пошли станции на пользу".

traits.locale_text: "You aren't wrong. My path was long and bloody, but in the end I had risen from running a gang that had staked its claim to a treatment filter station to becoming the Liege of Footfall. Many died to make this possible. And those who survived figured it would be more convenient to put me at the head than continue the slaughter of the turf war. I can only hope that my elevation and the peace that came with it did the station good."

languages.text: 「君は間違っていない。私の道のりは長く血なまぐさいものだったが、最終的には処理フィルターステーションの権利を主張するギャングの長から、フットフォールの領主にまで上り詰めた。ここまで来るのにたくさんの人が命を落とした。そして生き残った人間は、縄張り争いで殺し合いを続けるよりも、私をトップにした方が都合が良いと考えたんだ。私の出世と平和が、ステーションに良い影響を与えたことを祈るばかりだよ」
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. My path was long and bloody, but in the end I rose from running a gang that had staked its claim to a treatment filter station to becoming the Liege of Footfall. Many died to make this possible. And those who survived figured it would be more convenient to put me at the head than continue the slaughter of the turf war. I can only hope that my elevation and the peace that came with it have done the station good."

traits.locale_text: 「君は間違っていない。私の道のりは長く血なまぐさいものだったが、最終的には処理フィルターステーションの権利を主張するギャングの長から、フットフォールの領主にまで上り詰めた。ここまで来るのにたくさんの人が命を落とした。そして生き残った人間は、縄張り争いで殺し合いを続けるよりも、私をトップにした方が都合が良いと考えたんだ。私の出世と平和が、ステーションに良い影響を与えたことを祈るばかりだよ」

languages.text: “您说得没错。我的道路漫长而血腥，但到了最后，我从一个掌管医疗过滤站的小小帮派头目，崛起成为管理整个落脚港的总督。在这个过程中，很多人丢了性命，而那些幸存下来的人认为，比起为了地盘争斗不休，还不如让我来当首领。我只希望我的升迁以及随之而来的和平，会为这座星站带来益处。”
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. My path was long and bloody, but in the end I rose from running a gang that had staked its claim to a treatment filter station to becoming the Liege of Footfall. Many died to make this possible. And those who survived figured it would be more convenient to put me at the head than continue the slaughter of the turf war. I can only hope that my elevation and the peace that came with it have done the station good."

traits.locale_text: “您说得没错。我的道路漫长而血腥，但到了最后，我从一个掌管医疗过滤站的小小帮派头目，崛起成为管理整个落脚港的总督。在这个过程中，很多人丢了性命，而那些幸存下来的人认为，比起为了地盘争斗不休，还不如让我来当首领。我只希望我的升迁以及随之而来的和平，会为这座星站带来益处。”

languages.text: «Y no se equivoca. Mi trayectoria fue dilatada y sangrienta, pero al final pasé de liderar una banda que se había apropiado de una estación de depuración a ser el Señor de Paso. Muchos murieron para hacer esto posible y los supervivientes se dieron cuenta de que era mejor ponerme al mando que perpetuar la carnicería de una guerra interna. Solo espero que mi ascenso y la paz que trajo consigo hayan hecho que las cosas vayan a mejor en la estación».
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. My path was long and bloody, but in the end I rose from running a gang that had staked its claim to a treatment filter station to becoming the Liege of Footfall. Many died to make this possible. And those who survived figured it would be more convenient to put me at the head than continue the slaughter of the turf war. I can only hope that my elevation and the peace that came with it have done the station good."

traits.locale_text: «Y no se equivoca. Mi trayectoria fue dilatada y sangrienta, pero al final pasé de liderar una banda que se había apropiado de una estación de depuración a ser el Señor de Paso. Muchos murieron para hacer esto posible y los supervivientes se dieron cuenta de que era mejor ponerme al mando que perpetuar la carnicería de una guerra interna. Solo espero que mi ascenso y la paz que trajo consigo hayan hecho que las cosas vayan a mejor en la estación».

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas tort. Au bout d'un chemin tortueux et sanglant, j'ai fini par laisser derrière moi la petite bande que j'avais installée dans une station de filtrage pour devenir suzerain de Castel. Beaucoup de gens sont morts pour me permettre d'arriver à mes fins, et les survivants ont estimé qu'il valait mieux m'avoir à leur tête plutôt que de continuer le massacre de cette guerre de territoire. J'espère simplement que mon nouveau statut et la paix qui l'a accompagné auront fait du bien à la station. »
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. My path was long and bloody, but in the end I rose from running a gang that had staked its claim to a treatment filter station to becoming the Liege of Footfall. Many died to make this possible. And those who survived figured it would be more convenient to put me at the head than continue the slaughter of the turf war. I can only hope that my elevation and the peace that came with it have done the station good."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas tort. Au bout d'un chemin tortueux et sanglant, j'ai fini par laisser derrière moi la petite bande que j'avais installée dans une station de filtrage pour devenir suzerain de Castel. Beaucoup de gens sont morts pour me permettre d'arriver à mes fins, et les survivants ont estimé qu'il valait mieux m'avoir à leur tête plutôt que de continuer le massacre de cette guerre de territoire. J'espère simplement que mon nouveau statut et la paix qui l'a accompagné auront fait du bien à la station. »

languages.text: "Da habt Ihr nicht unrecht. Mein Weg war lang und blutig, aber am Ende erhob ich mich aus einer Bande, die eine Aufbereitungsfilterstation kontrollierte, und wurde der Lehnsherr von Footfall. Viele mussten dafür sterben. Und die Überlebenden hielten es für besser, mich an die Spitze zu setzen, anstatt den Krieg ums Territorium fortzusetzen. Ich kann nur hoffen, dass meine Beförderung und der damit verbundene Frieden für die Station von Vorteil waren."
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. My path was long and bloody, but in the end I rose from running a gang that had staked its claim to a treatment filter station to becoming the Liege of Footfall. Many died to make this possible. And those who survived figured it would be more convenient to put me at the head than continue the slaughter of the turf war. I can only hope that my elevation and the peace that came with it have done the station good."

traits.locale_text: "Da habt Ihr nicht unrecht. Mein Weg war lang und blutig, aber am Ende erhob ich mich aus einer Bande, die eine Aufbereitungsfilterstation kontrollierte, und wurde der Lehnsherr von Footfall. Viele mussten dafür sterben. Und die Überlebenden hielten es für besser, mich an die Spitze zu setzen, anstatt den Krieg ums Territorium fortzusetzen. Ich kann nur hoffen, dass meine Beförderung und der damit verbundene Frieden für die Station von Vorteil waren."

languages.text: "Haksız değilsiniz. Uzun ve kanlı bir yolda yürüdüm, sonunda bir arıtma istasyonunda hak iddia eden bir çete elebaşlığından Binliman Emîrliği'ne yükseldim. Bu uğurda çok kişi öldü, hayatta kalanlarsa yetki savaşını sürdürmektense beni başa geçirmenin daha uygun olacağını düşündü. Umarım yükselişim ve birlikte gelen huzur, istasyonu biraz da olsa rahatlatmıştır."
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. My path was long and bloody, but in the end I rose from running a gang that had staked its claim to a treatment filter station to becoming the Liege of Footfall. Many died to make this possible. And those who survived figured it would be more convenient to put me at the head than continue the slaughter of the turf war. I can only hope that my elevation and the peace that came with it have done the station good."

traits.locale_text: "Haksız değilsiniz. Yolum uzun ve kanlıydı ama sonunda bir arıtım filtre istasyonunda hak iddia eden bir çeteyi yönetmekten Binliman Emîrliği'ne yükseldim. Bu uğurda çok kişi öldü, hayatta kalanlarsa yetki savaşını sürdürmektense beni başa geçirmenin daha uygun olacağını düşündü. Umarım yükselişim ve birlikte gelen huzur istasyonu biraz da olsa rahatlatmıştır."
